complexParameter.name: script
complexParameter.core:text:
def codelistProperties = [ ["QuietAreaDocumentation", "citationType", "http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/inspire/CitationTypeValue"], ["QuietAreaDocumentation", "citationLevel", "http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/LegislationLevelValue"], ["QuietArea", "quietAreaName_localNameLanguage", "http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/common/iso639-3"], ["QuietArea", "protectionFrom", "http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/noise/NoiseSourceValue"], ["QuietArea", "specialisedZoneType", "http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/inspire/SpecialisedZoneTypeCode"], ["QuietArea", "zoneType", "http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/ZoneTypeCode"], ["QuietArea", "competentAuthority_role", "http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/RelatedPartyRoleValue"], ["QuietArea", "legalBasis_level", "http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/LegislationLevelValue"], ["QuietArea", "environmentalDomain", "http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/EnvironmentalDomain"] ]
codelistProperties.each { value -> _target { tableName( value[0] ) propertyName ( value[1] ) codelist ( value[2] ) } }

complexParameter.name: script
complexParameter.core:text:
def dataSetProperties = [ ["QuietArea", "competentAuthority", "nilReason", "http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/VoidReasonValue/Unpopulated"], ["QuietArea", "designationPeriod", "nilReason", "http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/VoidReasonValue/Unpopulated"], ["QuietArea", "legalBasis_link", "href", "http://data.europa.eu/eli/dir/2002/49/oj"], ["QuietArea", "legalBasis_level", "href", "https://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/LegislationLevelValue/european"], ["QuietArea", "beginLifespanVersion", "nilReason", "http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/VoidReasonValue/Unpopulated"], ["QuietArea", "zoneType", "href", "http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/ZoneTypeCode/noiseRestrictionZone"], ["QuietArea", "environmentalDomain", "href", "http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/EnvironmentalDomain/noise"], ["QuietArea", "quietAreaId_IdentifierScheme", "href", "http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/inspire/IdentifierScheme/EUENDCode"] ]
dataSetProperties.each { value -> _target { tableName( value[0] ) propertyName ( value[1] ) attribute ( value[2] ) defaultValue( value[3] ) } }
